import java.util.*;
import java.lang.*;
import java.io.*;

 class NitsSats{
	public static void main(String [] args){
	int []a=new int[10001];
	for(int i=1;i<10001;i++) a[i]=1;
	int temp=2;
	int n=10001;
	while(temp<n){
		int c=temp;
		for(int i=1;i<10001;i++){
			if(a[i]==1&&c>0){
				c-=1;
			}
			if(c==0){
				a[i]=0;
				c=temp;
				n-=1;
			}
		}
		temp+=1;
	}
	//for(int i=1;i<50;i++) System.out.print(a[i]+" "); System.out.println("");
	int t;
	Scanner sc = new Scanner (System.in);
	t = sc.nextInt();
	while(t!=0){
		t-=1;
		n = sc.nextInt();
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){
			if(a[i]==1) System.out.print(i+" ");
			else continue;
		}
		System.out.println("");
	}

	}
}
